name: A 2d representation of a 4D game of Pong
name_original: A 2d representation of a 4D game of Pong
description:
NOTE - You NEED two players to play.

ANOTHER NOTE - If the web version does not work, please try the downloadable version.

This game is a 2D representation of what 4D pong would look like. (An explanation of why it looks like this can be found in the game)

I had a random thought of what 4D pong might look like and decided to create this.

If this game draws enough attention, I might add more stuff to it. (Single player, Online multiplayer, ability to change the game's colour palettes, etc.) If you have any ideas, feel free to leave a comment.

Paddle controls

Player 1Player 2W and S                             Up arrow and down arrow
